body_html: No, unfortunately we're tied to support Py2, but we already have a plan that doesn't need any of the Python-level tracing. In one mode we only trace the PyTorch operations we care about (control flow inlined), in the other mode (this one), we just translate the AST into our own internal language, and do full static analysis to capture control flow.

body: No, unfortunately we're tied to support Py2, but we already have a plan that doesn't need any of the Python-level tracing. In one mode we only trace the PyTorch operations we care about (control flow inlined), in the other mode (this one), we just translate the AST into our own internal language, and do full static analysis to capture control flow.
